TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A drug that is used to help control some types of seizures. It is being studied in the prevention of peripheral neuropathy caused by some chemotherapy drugs. It belongs to the family of drugs called anticonvulsants.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Medicamento que se usa para ayudar a controlar algunos tipos de convulsiones. Está en estudio para prevenir la neuropatía periférica que causan ciertos medicamentos contra el cáncer. Es un anticonvulsivo.
